buildup.text: In 1970, student John Pasche was commissioned by Mick Jagger to create art for the band's record label.

discovery.text: Pasche drew inspiration from Jagger's famous lips and the Hindu goddess Kali's protruding tongue.

climax.text: The tongue logo transcended music to become a universal symbol of rebellion and rock culture.
